title: Mobile Suit Gundam II: Soldiers of Sorrow
synopsis: As the War continues, Amuro and the White Base crew must make their way toward the Earth Federation Headquarters, Jaburo. On their way they meet several new enemies and face off against impossible odds. They fight in Operation Odessa to relieve the Earth from the clutches of the Zeon forces.
related_anime: ['Mobile Suit Gundam', 'Mobile Suit Gundam I', 'Mobile Suit Gundam III: Encounters in Space']
